title: Cabinet approves budget proposals for fiscal year 2022-23
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 10 (APP): The federal cabinet chaired by Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif on Friday approved the budget proposals for the fiscal year 2022-23.
The cabinet also accorded approval to the Finance Bill 2022.
Finance Minister Miftah Ismael will present the budgetary proposals in the National Assembly this afternoon.
